alert.note: Alert for Carquinez Strait and Delta; Northern San Joaquin Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 12:36PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Joaquin County through 115 PM PST... At 1235 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near ear Stockton, moving east norteast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Funnel clouds are possible. Locations impacted include... Stockton, Waterloo, Country Club, Taft Mosswood, Garden Acres, Kennedy, August, Linden, Morada, Lincoln Village and Lockeford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Carquinez Strait and Delta; Northern San Joaquin Valley
